settings.product_service_help_text: The version of GeeTest CAPTCHA you what to use.
settings.context_event_help_text: Enable to use GeeTest CAPTCHA into different context events or business types, you can set a standalone configuration for each context.

config.title: Config for {context}
config.standalone_help_text: Enable to use a standalone configuration for this scenario.
config.product_help_text: Choose the presentation of the verify panel.
config.product_float_help_text: Switch from validation button to validation panel.
config.product_bind_help_text: Trigger the validation panel with a specified button.
config.id_help_text: The verify ID of the context event you applied on the GeeTest dashboard.
config.key_help_text: The verify key of the context event you applied on the GeeTest dashboard.

test.title: Test CAPTCHA
test.help_text: Use the general configuration above to test the CAPTCHA.
